name: Spirit Infused Yutto's Modified NCU
raw: ------------------------------ Ingredients ------------------------------ These nifty new NCU will be a great upgrade for your yuttos NCU. You can find the parts in Albtraum. You can find the guide for the tool needed #L "here" "/tell recipe 594". #L "Ancient Engineering Device" "267751" #L "Dormant Ancient Circuit" "267794" #L "Yuttos Modified NCU" "238921" ------------------------------ Recipe ------------------------------ Ancient Engineering Device + Dormant Ancient Circuit = #L "Active Ancient Circuit" "267795" Skills: | 1500 ME | Active Ancient Circuit + Yuttos Modified NCU = #L "Spirit Infused Yuttos Modified NCU" "267797" Skills: | 6X the QL of ME | To make a QL 220 NCU into a QL 300 you will need 1800ME.
